name: places/ChIJha08x6BZwokRXOdZRQfEh8U
formattedAddress: 23 Lexington Ave, New York, NY 10010, USA
adrFormatAddress: 23 Lexington Ave, New York, NY 10010-3790, USA

originalText.text:
I am deeply disappointed with Sirius XM due to a severe lapse in account security and inadequate customer service. My account was hijacked, and despite numerous attempts, Sirius XM has failed to secure my personal and financial information. Their refusal to close my account or remove my credit card details is alarming.

Their customer service is rigid and unhelpful, offering no solutions outside their narrow set of predefined issues. This is particularly frustrating as I don't even have an active subscription with them, yet they refuse to close my account.

In summary, my experience with Sirius XM has been fraught with security concerns and customer service failures.

Their customer service is rigid and unhelpful, offering no solutions outside their narrow set of predefined issues. This is particularly frustrating as I don't even have an active subscription with them, yet they refuse to close my account.

In summary, my experience with Sirius XM has been fraught with security concerns and customer service failures.

originalText.text: They’ve sent junk mail for years. I cancelled my service months ago and asked for no telemarketing. Now they’ve begun harassing me on my cell. I’m filing a complaint with the FCC and recommend others do too.

text.text: They’ve sent junk mail for years. I cancelled my service months ago and asked for no telemarketing. Now they’ve begun harassing me on my cell. I’m filing a complaint with the FCC and recommend others do too.

originalText.text: Single handledly the worst subscription scam in America. Whether I I cancel or my wife cancels, they still try to collect. Even when we pay for a year in full and continously bombard us. Such garbage. This is why people stream spotify.

originalText.text:
Do you like never ending phone calls for a service you never asked for?

If so, sirius is for you.
